verses.verse: There was <S%H1961><s%> also a lot <S%H1486><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> to wit, for Machir <S%H4353><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gilead: <S%H1568><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> therefore he had <S%H1961><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

There was <S%H1961><s%> also a lot for the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> by their families; <S%H4940><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Abiezer, <S%H44><s%> and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Helek, <S%H2507><s%> and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asriel, <S%H844><s%> and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7928><s%> and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Shemida: <S%H8061><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were the male <S%H2145><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> by their families. <S%H4940><s%>

But Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> daughters: <S%H1323><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his daughters, <S%H1323><s%> Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> and Noah, <S%H5270><s%> Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> and Tirzah. <S%H8656><s%>

And they came near <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> the princes, <S%H5387><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> us an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> our brethren. <S%H251><s%> Therefore according <S%H413><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> them an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the brethren <S%H251><s%> of their father. <S%H1><s%>

And there fell <S%H5307><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> portions <S%H2256><s%> to Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan; <S%H3383><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> had an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his sons: <S%H1121><s%> and the rest <S%H3498><s%> of Manasseh's <S%H4519><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> from Asher <S%H4480><s%> <S%H836><s%> to Michmethah, <S%H4366><s%> that <S%H834><s%> lieth before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Shechem; <S%H7927><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> went along <S%H1980><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the right hand <S%H3225><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of En-tappuah. <S%H5887><s%>

Now Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Tappuah: <S%H8599><s%> but Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> belonged to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim; <S%H669><s%>

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> unto the river <S%H5158><s%> Kanah, <S%H7071><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> of the river: <S%H5158><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> are among <S%H8432><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> also was on the north side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> of the river, <S%H5158><s%> and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> of it were <S%H1961><s%> at the sea: <S%H3220><s%>

Southward <S%H5045><s%> it was Ephraim's, <S%H669><s%> and northward <S%H6828><s%> it was Manasseh's, <S%H4519><s%> and the sea <S%H3220><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> his border; <S%H1366><s%> and they met together <S%H6293><s%> in Asher <S%H836><s%> on the north, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> and in Issachar <S%H3485><s%> on the east. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4217><s%>

And Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> in Issachar <S%H3485><s%> and in Asher <S%H836><s%> Beth-shean <S%H1052><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Endor <S%H5874><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> even three <S%H7969><s%> countries. <S%H5316><s%>

Yet the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> the inhabitants of <S%H853><s%> those <S%H428><s%> cities; <S%H5892><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in that <S%H2088><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

Yet it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were waxen strong, <S%H2388><s%> that they put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> to tribute; <S%H4522><s%> but did not <S%H3808><s%> utterly drive them out. <S%H3423><s%> <S%H3423><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H854><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4069><s%> hast thou given <S%H5414><s%> me but one <S%H259><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> portion <S%H2256><s%> to inherit, <S%H5159><s%> seeing I <S%H589><s%> am a great <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> forasmuch <S%H5704><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> me hitherto? <S%H834><s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3541><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> them, If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> be a great <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> then get thee up <S%H5927><s%> to the wood <S%H3293><s%> country, and cut down <S%H1254><s%> for thyself there <S%H8033><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> and of the giants, <S%H7497><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> be too narrow <S%H213><s%> for thee.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> The hill <S%H2022><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> enough <S%H4672><s%> for us: and all <S%H3605><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%> have chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> both they who <S%H834><s%> are of Beth-shean <S%H1052><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and they who <S%H834><s%> are of the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> even to Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and to Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> art a great <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and hast great <S%H1419><s%> power: <S%H3581><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> only:

But <S%H3588><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thine; for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a wood, <S%H3293><s%> and thou shalt cut it down: <S%H1254><s%> and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be <S%H1931><s%> thine: for <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they have iron <S%H1270><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and though <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> be strong. <S%H2389><s%>
